title: Account does not yet have access to the alpha test.
body:
When I try to login through the Alpha Client I get the message "Account does not yet have access to the alpha test", I have not a clue why, I have gotten the email sending me the link to the download, which says "Your alpha application was approved".

Am I doing something wrong or is it just not accepting me because "reasons"?

Thanks-

replies.body: Be sure you're logging in with the account that was accepted into the Alpha Client. If you still encounter issues, [grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of the error and link it to me.

There is no error to link, it just says "Account does not yet have access to the alpha test".
Even though I am, and I am definitely using the right account.

It looks like we had some issues properly granting access to players into the Alpha, according to [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner/EHKLUm8A-terribly-transparent-update-on-client-alpha-acceptance-problems). The last update confirms everything was fixed from our end, so you shouldn't encounter further authorization issues. 

If you still are, please confirm you're selecting the right region from the dropdown box at the login screen and try logging in again.
I can confirm that I cannot login still, same issues, and I have checked if I'm in the right region and language, and I am.

Hmm.. it's possible some files in the Alpha Client are borked. Maybe try uninstalling and grabbing a fresh installer from [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/download)

I really hope that does it!

All of the sudden, as if by the universes will, I can login for some unexplained reason now. Thanks for your help, but I guess it was just a matter of Riots mood I guess.

But I have 1 more quick question, why is the new {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}}  skin unavailable? I thought it was released today but the store doesn't give me or my friends the option to buy it, instead it says "Unavailable".
It's probably everyone experiencing this.
Those new skins haven't released just yet, but if you keep an eye on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/), you should see an announcement when we've released it for sale. ^.^
